issue.title: [CF 103] Runic Power / Energy on Conditionals
issue.body:
What is the enhancement in mind? How should it look and feel?

I use tellmewhen to track runic power and energy, in some specs these resources are greater than 100 which makes things very tricky with percentages.
I was wondering if you could implement an option to track these resources by their numerical value instead of percentages?

I'm also Curious if you ever plan to integrate runes in such a way that would allow me to track them specifically over tellmewhen for instance I could set up a group of 6 and set 1 rune for every spot.  In essence copying the Default Rune Bar.

Please provide any additional information below.


> Posted by CurseForge user srichards | Imported from CurseForge issue #103 | Raw

comments.body:
Percentage = desired/max

And no on the rune tracker. There are a million rune trackers out there already.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
